Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.qdc.lims.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service for user management and authentication. Implements Spring Security's UserDetailsService for authentication integration.

      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • authenticate

      @Transactional public User authenticate(String username, String rawPassword)
      Authenticate a user with username and password. Updates last login time on successful authentication.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      rawPassword - the plain text password
      Returns:
      the authenticated User, or null if authentication fails

    • createUser

      @Transactional public User createUser(User user)
      Create a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to create (password should be raw)
      Returns:
      the saved user

      @Transactional public User updateUser(User user)

      Change a user's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      newRawPassword - the new password (will be encoded)
